archimate:Requirement.name: R6 Communication and Education strategy is created
archimate:Requirement.documentation: U22 As Security Baseline Owner We want to ensure that stakeholders understand what the baseline does and doesn't do to avoid miscommunication and overcommitment and to promote better understanding U28 As a developer I need an easy communication channel to ensure consistent awareness of the security baseline throughout Connect U29 As a developer I need communcation and education strategy and process to be in place to enable us to effectively communicate out the work we are doing and ensure it gets used
